pycfgr package¶

Submodules¶

pycfgr.config module¶

pycfgr config reader class

class pycfgr.config.Config(config='config.yml', mode='default', reader='yaml', use_parent=True, sep='.')[source]¶

Bases: dict

pycfgr config reader class.

It supports multiple settings with possible inheritance. The class inherits from the dict class, so it supports all methods like get, pop or items. Values within config can be interpolated based on other values.

get(*args)[source]¶

Get config value.

Parameters:*args – field names to look for. Subsequent names are treated as nested names.
pick(path)[source]¶

Get config value using path.

Parameters:path (str) – Path specifying element to look for. Must use the sep attribute.

pycfgr.readers module¶

Default config reading functions
